Maps.name: Star Wars Imperial Rain (Open World)
Maps.description:
Is this multiplayer compatible? 

No, this map is intended for single-player play. If you try this with other people game-breaking bugs or soft locks may appear. If you want to play Imperial Rain with friends there's information on it in the spawn hub.

How do I play or process?

You first spawn in a hub, it has information on how to play and what to do.

To process the story you go to the white beacon and talk to the NPC to begin the mission.

The Story

The game takes place in the year 3 ABY or during The Empire Strikes Back! You play as Miller Clark, he's freshly out of the Empire after being conscripted. This is one of the first open-world maps on Minecraft Bedrock to have a protagonist. This map also features voice acting and cutscenes! Miller Clark is looking for a new line of work and not interested in the traditional ways of work. Rinson, an old friend of Miller is eagerly waiting for him to come back so they can start their "work". See Star Wars never seen before in this Open World game where you take in the eyes of Miller and his criminal experience across the galaxy! It takes on a more mature style on Star Wars!

The Maps

There are three open planets seen in the films!

Coruscant

Tatooine

Bespin

They also have iconic locations seen in the films!

Content

There are many blasters you can purchase in-game that are seen in the films. There is food that you can eat that is seen in films and unique enemies! You can freely roam the planets.

Maps.name: Temple Speedrunning Practice
Maps.description:
Have you ever tried speedrunning minecraft for yourself and find it difficult? Well, this map helps you in one aspect of speedrunning if you can find it. You can train how to loot the desert temple in many different ways. 

 

Spawning inside the world, you are outside a desert temple floating in the middle of nowhere to clear players off distractions. The temple is almost accurately recreated to look like a real one, outside it you will find two buttons. One button resets the map if you ever mess up and want to start over again. You have the choice to loot the temple with nothing at all since it is very much possible, but if you want to have the ideal tools you want for a speedrun, press the other button.

Maps.name: Fantasy Bedwars
Maps.description:
Welcome to Bedwars! You can play with up to 16 players on the exciting Fantasy map! Main goal of Bedwars is to destroy other teams' beds and eliminate them. You also have to collect loot from generators to protect your bed and buy gear. If your bed gets destroyed, you will no longer respawn. This map is an extension to PortalMG and Void Games Realms.

 

This is the map you will be playing on. Tip: Study the map closely. You will be able to get to other team's islands and generators much faster.

Maps.name: The Pirate's Paradise [Custom Terrain] [Survival]
Maps.description:
Do you want to be a pirate? Get in the mood with my new map! No, it doesn't come with a pirate ship, or real pirates, but the custom terrain is great if you want to build upon it.

Creator: Pdtheyoutuber

Features

  • 51 Different Custom Structures
  • 24 Different Village Structures
  • 52 Possible Custom Tree Types
  • 14 Custom Dungeon Variations
  • 773 Biome Variations

When you spawn, you will notice the huge islands of land, in a swamp-like environment. This is a new biome called the island spires. In this biome you can find 14 different types of dungeon, and many other things.

This is my second map in the series, I have a lot more coming very soon! If you want a map of your own, you can submit a request here.

Maps.name: Pirate's Adventures
Maps.description:
In the pirate's adventures we have a small town, tavern, dock, lighthouse, pirate base, shipwrecks, enemy ships and a controllabe ship.

The dock

2nd dock

 

Shop

 

Skeleton Base

Pirate Base

 

Pirate Base 2

Ships

All of them has treasure chests

Sloop

Viking ship

Brigantine

Galleon

It can shoot your ship if you are close before fighting with it you must take a save and make your ships hull upgraded with obsidian so it can't burn. You can buy obsidian from shop.

Total eclipse

This ship is controllable too but first you must capture it.

Maps.name: Star Wars Imperial Rain (Open World)
Maps.description:
Is this multiplayer compatible? 

No, this map is intended for single-player play. If you try this with other people game-breaking bugs or soft locks may appear. If you want to play Imperial Rain with friends there's information on it in the spawn hub.

How do I play or process?

You first spawn in a hub, it has information on how to play and what to do.

To process the story you go to the white beacon and talk to the NPC to begin the mission.

The Story

The game takes place in the year 3 ABY or during The Empire Strikes Back! You play as Miller Clark, he's freshly out of the Empire after being conscripted. This is one of the first open-world maps on Minecraft Bedrock to have a protagonist. This map also features voice acting and cutscenes! Miller Clark is looking for a new line of work and not interested in the traditional ways of work. Rinson, an old friend of Miller is eagerly waiting for him to come back so they can start their "work". See Star Wars never seen before in this Open World game where you take in the eyes of Miller and his criminal experience across the galaxy! It takes on a more mature style on Star Wars!

The Maps

There are three open planets seen in the films!

Coruscant

Tatooine

Bespin

They also have iconic locations seen in the films!

 

Content

There are many blasters you can purchase in-game that are seen in the films. There is food that you can eat that is seen in films and unique enemies! You can freely roam the planets.

Want News on Imperial Rain or chat with like-minded people?

Then join the Imperial Rain Discord! https://discord.gg/DSUATxrYPv Or check out the Voyage Games on Youtube, Twitter or Instagram to have the latest news on new games!

Game settings

Set to adventure mode

Griefing off

Fire Spread off

Keep Inventory on

Credits

Written and Produced by Ryan

Big Thanks to Andi Gaspar or his Twitter: @AndiuberOficial https://twitter.com/AndiuberOficial
For letting me use their Player Model NPC pack! This project would not be possible without them!

Maps.name: Futsal [Minigame]
Maps.description:
How to play?

The stadium includes a scoreboard system and there are also additional cool features like open/close the ceiling. Everything has been made with powerful command blocks and there are a lot of cool places to explore such as shops, museum and a restaurant. You can find football boots, jerseys, food items and balls in the chest scattered around the stadium. It's recommended for minimum 2 players and each time your team scores you will see it on the screen. Max scoreboard value is 4, so game ends at 4 goals. Once scoring a goal a new ball will be spawned in the center of the stadium. Here is a list of replaced items.

  • Hambugers (Beef / Porkchop)
  • Ice Creams (Pumpkin Pie, Carrots)
  • Money (Emeralds)
  • New Paintings
  • Football Boots (Swords with knockback enchantments)
  • Jerseys (Armor)

Credits

Karlos Game CZ and mastered by Nogard

  • Addon (balls, football boots...) made by Nogard

Trailer

https://www.youtube.com/embed/jvFbadzcmco

License Terms

All rights reserved. By downloading of this Minecraft minigame you agree with this terms. No part of this work may be reproduced or transmitted without author\'s permission. Person with permission must share the addon only with official download links and credits to author. Illegal distribution of this addon in apps, websites and YouTube videos and earning money from Nogard\'s and Karlos Game\'s ownership will be punished by law. For other ways of sharing and editing the source code, you must contact the author.

  • Nogard
  • Contacts:
    • Email: nogmcpe@gmail.com
    • Twitter: @Nogard_YT

Maps.name: Soccer Game [Minigame]
Maps.description:
This minigame brings soccer to Minecraft by transforming pigs into soccer balls. The map design is fairly simple as it's built in a flat world, but the game mechanics are both fun and engaging. There are two different teams (red vs blue) and each team's objective is to kick (or rather hit) the soccer ball into the other team's goal. Have fun!

Creator: MattH44, Twitter, Website
Updated: 7 April, 2018 (read changelog)

How to play?

Take the items from the chest at spawn before entering the soccer arena. It's recommended to play by the ordinary soccer game rules, but you could also just make it up as you go.

Changelog

  • Added a start room
  • Invisible barrier around field instead of fences
  • Changed texture for the soccer ball egg (pig spawn egg)
  • Changed goals and corner flags
  • Added chairs on the outside

Maps.name: Slime Soccer [Minigame]
Maps.description:
Slime Soccer is a really fun and clever multiplayer minigame for 2-4 players. The ball is in fact a slime mob but its size is much similar to soccer ball and you can use different types of sticks to hit the ball. The rules are basically the same as in normal soccer except that you have to keep in mind that the ball will constantly be moving (as it's a mob) so you won't always be able to control its position.

Creator: TerrySze

How to play?

The map can be played by up to four players. (Two players on each team.) Put on the gear and grab the sticks in the chests. The sticks have different knockback effects and are used for hitting the ball (or slime).

It's a big soccer field so make sure to work out some good teamwork.

If someone scores a goal then the other team should get the ball and both teams should return to their half of the soccer field.

Maps.name: Bikini Bottom City [Creation]
Maps.description:
Enter the universe of SpongeBob and his friends. This is Bikini Bottom City. It's a fictional city, of course, but nonetheless an amazing map to explore. It includes most of the locations as seen in the animated TV series. Some of the houses include SpongeBob's pineapple house and along with the neighbouring houses. There's is also the Bikini Bottom Mall and lots of other places to explore we can assure you.

The map is ported from the PC version of Minecraft. That's why some of the areas in the map are black and looks bugged. Ignore that if you can or replace them with new blocks. When we tested the map it was completely free of lag and never crashed.

Ported by: Cesarneitor7, Twitter Account

To really make it appear as if you are in the universe of SpongeBob download and use one of the skins found here (click here).

Maps.name: Bikini Bottom (SpongeBob) [Creation]
Maps.description:
Bikini Bottom is the city and main setting for the SpongeBob SquarePants animated TV series. This map includes everything from SpongeBob's own pineapple house to the Bikini Bottom Mall. If you've ever watched it on TV then we can guarantee you will find many similarities to this Minecraft Pocket Edition map.  To really get in a SpongeBob mood we recommend that you download a SpongeBob skin!

Creator: TheUndercoverCactus, Twitter Account
Updated: 5 December, 2016
